fields.name: Marley Coffee One Love Medium Roast Organic Coffee
fields.description: From the birthplace of coffee come the exotic floral and berry notes of single-origin Ethiopia Yirgacheffe beans. Sayin’ brown sugar, vanilla, with a kiss of spice, just one warming sip and you’ll feel the calm, the peace, and the love of all creation

fields.name: Pomodorina Italian sauce
fields.description: Pomodorina is an exceptional concasse of tomatoes, vegetables and herbs with flavour and body that nothing can beat. Made from the freshest of top quality Italian tomatoes, picked at the peak of the season. Pomodorina can be used as a base to make sauces, canapes, soups, whatever your imagination desires. Small sweet diced tomatoes make it an authentic concasse that tastes and looks homemade.

fields.name: Vegan Gourmet Jamaican Rum Truffles
fields.description: Rum Truffles from Marshall & Brown, handmade by highly skilled Master Chocolatiers who take great care in producing these small bundles to delight your tastebuds. The chocolate Jamaican rum truffles are made using chocolate ganache, infused with a Jamaican rum from a long-established distiller.

fields.name: Lively Up! Espresso Roast Organic Coffee
fields.description: Marley Coffee Lively Up! Lively Up Yourself! with this big, bold espresso—an almighty blend with subtle hints of dark chocolate, caramel and buttercream. Good people, come together, and spread a message of goodness. That’s the Marley Coffee way.

fields.name: Buffalo Soldier Nespresso Compatible Capsules, Pack of 10
fields.description: Buffalo Soldier is an earthy and bold dark roast blend – sultry, smokey and deliciously smooth. The dark chocolate and berry undertones leave a rich, lingering finish in this liberating cup.

fields.name: The Jerk House, Jamaican Jerk Sauce
fields.description: The Jerk House seasoning and range of sauces are the authentic taste of Jamaica. The exotic blend of Jamaican herbs and spices create that unique taste of Jamaica.

fields.name: The Jerk House, Caribbean Red Pepper Sauce
fields.description: The Jerk House seasoning and range of sauces are the authentic taste of Jamaica. The exotic blend of Jamaican herbs and spices create that unique taste of Jamaica.

fields.name: Simmer Down Decaffeinated Organic Coffee
fields.description: For mellow moods, ease into the morning with a smooth cup of Simmer Down, our Swiss Water Process, chemical-free, decaf blend. Subtle aromas of cocoa, nutmeg and spices fill this cup to help you share the love out.

fields.name: Smile Jamaica 20% Jamaica Blue Mountain Coffee
fields.description: Smile Jamaica is our signature blend, comprised of a minimum 20% Jamaica Blue Mountain® coffee. It carries a rich flavour, balanced acidity and full body. Smile Jamaica leaves a sweet, mellow, lingering finish. You’re gonna smile!

fields.name: Neroitalia 100% Jamaica Blue Mountain Coffee
fields.description: Flamstead Estate, located in the parish of St Andrew, at an altitude of 2800 – 3280 feet above sea-level, lies in an area associated with the production of high quality Jamaica Blue Mountain coffee since 1764

fields.name: Greenwell Estate Hawaii Kona Coffee 250g
fields.description: This Greenwell Estate Private Reserve Kona coffee is so special because it is estate grown on just 60 hectares of the most productive land in the Kona District.

fields.name: Mama Brown’s Jamaican Rum Cake (Banana)
fields.description: Mama Brown’s has maintained traditional Jamaican recipes, so that you can experience this authentic taste of Jamaica. Mama Brown’s only use the finest quality tropical ingredients, flavoured by some of the world’s finest rum, to ensure that we make the most scrumptious, delicious rum cakes.

fields.name: Kentish Oils Presentation Gift Set – Plain, Lemon, Chilli & Garlic
fields.description: Kentish Oils Presentation Gift Set 250 ml - plain, lemon, chilli & garlic. Gluten free, Suitable for vegans, 100% natural ingredients. Kentish Oils single estate, single variety rapeseed oil is grown, pressed and bottled in the Garden of England. Kentish Oils use the highest quality rapeseed to produce cooking oils that make a healthy and appetising addition to any meal.

fields.name: Bialetti Moka Express 4-cup Stovetop
fields.description: A traditional way of brewing coffee in Italy, the Bialetti Moka Express 4-Cup Stovetop is an icon of their coffee industry.

fields.name: Hario V60 Buono Coffee Drip Kettle
fields.description: The Hario V60 Buono Coffee Drip Kettle is the ideal way to up your coffee game, due to its gooseneck spout which gives you full control over the pour.

fields.name: Wilfa Svart Grinder
fields.description: Sleek and approachable, the Wilfa Svart Grinder is one of the most affordable specialty coffee grinders available. Wilfa Svart grinders are compatible with a variety of brew methods: namely, the filter, french press, Aeropress and percolator.

fields.name: Hario Mini-Mill + Grinder
fields.description: When you are considering grinding your own coffee beans for the first time, or perhaps you need a clever little grinder to take on holiday, the Hario Mini Mill + Grinder is the perfect choice.

fields.name: Sage Barista Pro Coffee Machine
fields.description: Barista quality performance with an intuitive interface that displays all the information you need to create speciality coffee at home. The integrated grinder delivers the right amount of ground coffee on demand, for a rich full flavour.

fields.name: Wilfa Clasic+ Coffee Maker
fields.description: The Wilfa Classic + holds up to 1l of water which is perfect for a typical household. The manual drip-stop is smart and efficient, allowing you to choose how fast the water should flow through the filter.

fields.name: Geisha Coffee Costa Rica
fields.description: Quietly complex aromatics that reward patient attention with notes of lavender, cocoa and hints of molasses. The Coffea Diversa plantation where the geisha grows is unique as it grows the largest number of coffee varieties in the world
